Package comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Notifications

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionChecker
    Call to the static function ConnectionChecker.isConnected( context ) to check if you have an available network connection.
    ConnectionChecker.isThereConnectionTask
    Async task that checks to see if the user can connect to elastic search.Returns true if you can, otherwise false.
    ElasticNotificationController
    Maintains a user's notifications in elastic search
    ElasticNotificationController.AddNotificationTask
    Adds a notification to Elastic Search
    ElasticNotificationController.ClearAllTask
    Clears all requests related to a username
    ElasticNotificationController.FindNotificationTask
    Returns notifications based on a username
    ElasticNotificationController.MarkAsReadTask  
    Notification
    Notification class for storing and retrieving notifications.
    NotificationActivity
    NotificationActivity displays notifications about changes in a driver's offered requests or in a requester's requests.
    NotificationController
    Controller.
